meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that can cause food poisoning.
meanings.sent1: Salmonellae are harmful bacteria found in contaminated food.
meanings.sent2: I got sick from eating food contaminated with salmonellae.
meanings.sent3: The salmonellae in the potato salad decided to have a party in my stomach!
meanings.sent4: Like tiny invaders, salmonellae infiltrated the picnic basket of my gut.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the invisible threat of salmonellae lurking in undercooked chicken.

meanings.sent1: The doctor confirmed that the test results showed salmonellae in my system.
meanings.sent2: Salmonellae can be detected through laboratory tests.
meanings.sent3: The pet lizard's name was Salmonellae because it sounded cool.
meanings.sent4: In the lab, the scientist observed the salmonellae multiplying rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The outbreak was traced back to a single source of salmonellae contamination.
